price: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, Mun yi alkawari zuwa ga Ãdamu a gabãnin wannan, sai ya manta, kuma ba Mu sãmi ƙarfin zũciya a gare shi ba.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
